Get ready for Brew Ha Ha: Comedy Night - it's free, it's funny, and it's happening in person! (18+ Recommended)
Come join us for a night of laughter at Corporate Ladder Brewing Company!
Sit back, relax, and enjoy some hilarious stand-up comedy performances while sipping on delicious craft brews. This event is the perfect way to unwind after a long week and share some laughs with friends. Don't miss out on this opportunity to enjoy some free entertainment and great beer!
Reserve your seat now, space is limited

Clerical Error: A Potion-Fueled Adventure
Saturday, July 26, 2025
12:00‚ÄØPM
11:00‚ÄØPM
Google Calendar
ICS
You find yourself in a dimly lit taproom. The smell of sweet magic lingers in the air. A beertender approaches and asks‚Ä¶
‚ÄúRoll for a pour.‚Äù
Join us for a day long D&D inspired celebration where the only campaign is which potion to drink next. We‚Äôre dropping SIX magical gluten free dessert beers, each brewed to buff your taste buds and level up your stats.
Potion Drops Include:
Mana Potion Gluten Free Dessert Beer 6.5% ABV Gluten Free Dessert Beer conditioned on vanilla soft serve, cookie dough, chocolate chip, cacao nibs
Greater Mana Potion BA Gluten Free Dessert Beer 10% ABV Gluten Free Dessert Beer aged in rum barrels then conditioned on vanilla soft serve, cookie dough, chocolate chip, cacao nibs, graham cracker, cheesecake
Health Potion Gluten Free Dessert Beer 6.5% ABV Gluten Free Dessert Beer conditioned on watermelon and pomegranate soft serve
Greater Health Potion BA Gluten Free Dessert Beer 10% A Gluten Free Dessert Beer aged in tequila barrels then conditioned on watermelon, orange juice and pomegranate soft serve
Stamina Potion Gluten Free Dessert Beer 6.5% ABV Gluten Free Dessert Beer conditioned on green apple jolly ranchers and lime juice
Greater Stamina Potion BA Gluten Free Dessert Beer 10% ABV Gluten Free Dessert Beer aged in bourbon barrels then conditioned on green apple, lime, and mango
Dice will be rolled. Potions will be poured. Alignment will be questioned.

Special Guest Tapping: Mortalis
Friday, January 10, 2025
12:00‚ÄØPM
11:00‚ÄØPM
Corporate Ladder Brewing
4935 96th Street East
Palmetto, FL, 34221
United States
(map)
Google Calendar
ICS
Join us on Friday, January 10th, from 12 PM to 11 PM, as we host a Special Guest Tapping Event featuring our friends, the innovative Mortalis Brewing Company from Avon, NY!
About Mortalis Brewing Company: Founded in 2017, Mortalis has rapidly expanded its brewing capacity by 500% and gained recognition for their creative brews, including the first everything bagel DIPA and strawberry cheesecake milkshake IPA. Their philosophy centers on producing exceptional beer that fosters human connection, reminding us that we all have stories to tell and beers to share.
We'll be pouring FOUR of their exceptional beers:
Hydra | Schmoojee A La Mode (Fruit Smoothie Sour, 7% ABV)
Brewed in collaboration with Imprint Beer Co. hails a creamy tropical blend of strawberry, pineapple, coconut, and cream. *Contains dairy products.
Hydra | Sangria (Fruit Smoothie Sour, 7% ABV)
Your favorite sangria flavors in beer form! Apple, concord grape, orange, raspberry, peach, and lemon unite in a refreshing, fruity explosion.
BA Thanatos (BA Imperial Stout, 13% ABV)
A decadent coffee cake-inspired stout aged for 18 months in Wild Turkey barrels and conditioned on fresh cinnamon swirl coffee cakes. A dessert lover's dream!
Odins Revenge (DIPA, 8% ABV)
A juicy, citrusy double IPA dry-hopped with Motueka, Southern Passion, Galaxy, and Cryo Columbus. Lime zest, passion fruit, and ripe citrus flavors will delight your taste buds.
This is a unique opportunity to experience the bold and unforgettable flavors of Mortalis without leaving town!
Food Truck: 5pm - 9pm Spiced Kitchen

Join us to celebrate our 7 year anniversary! Here's what's dropping so far in package and on draft!
BA Black Tusk Imperial Stout 15.5% ABV - 500ml bottle
Imperial Stout barrel aged in Heaven Hill 20 year barrels for 23 months then conditioned on Nicaragua la Misericordia from Resident Coffee, Australian & Costa Rician vanilla beans

Join us on Friday, January 10th, from 12 PM to 11 PM, as we host a Special Guest Tapping Event featuring our friends, the innovative Mortalis Brewing Company from Avon, NY!
About Mortalis Brewing Company: Founded in 2017, Mortalis has rapidly expanded its brewing capacity by 500% and gained recognition for their creative brews, including the first everything bagel DIPA and strawberry cheesecake milkshake IPA. Their philosophy centers on producing exceptional beer that fosters human connection, reminding us that we all have stories to tell and beers to share.
We'll be pouring FOUR of their exceptional beers:
Hydra | Schmoojee A La Mode (Fruit Smoothie Sour, 7% ABV)
Brewed in collaboration with Imprint Beer Co. hails a creamy tropical blend of strawberry, pineapple, coconut, and cream. *Contains dairy products.
Hydra | Sangria (Fruit Smoothie Sour, 7% ABV)
Your favorite sangria flavors in beer form! Apple, concord grape, orange, raspberry, peach, and lemon unite in a refreshing, fruity explosion.
BA Thanatos (BA Imperial Stout, 13% ABV)
A decadent coffee cake-inspired stout aged for 18 months in Wild Turkey barrels and conditioned on fresh cinnamon swirl coffee cakes. A dessert lover's dream!
Odins Revenge (DIPA, 8% ABV)
A juicy, citrusy double IPA dry-hopped with Motueka, Southern Passion, Galaxy, and Cryo Columbus. Lime zest, passion fruit, and ripe citrus flavors will delight your taste buds.
This is a unique opportunity to experience the bold and unforgettable flavors of Mortalis without leaving town!

Board Meeting Barrel Aged Stout 14% ABV
2023 GABF GOLD WINNER FOR PASTRY/DESSERT CATEGORY

Member Pick Barrel Aged Stout 14% ABV

Double Barrel Deep Oblivion Imperial Stout 13% ABV | Cerebral Brewing
Imperial Stout aged 32 months in Willett Rye Barrels followed by 12 months in Stagg Jr Barrels conditioned on Coconut, Pecans & a blend of Congolese & Comorian Vanilla. Contains lactose.
Brownie Bash Invite Bottle #2 Barrel Aged Imperial Stout 13.9% ABV | Pontoon Brewing
Brownie Batch #2 in a Weller Antique Bourbon barrel for 29 months and Brownie Batch #3 in a 17 year Heaven Hill cask strength bourbon barrel to make the blend. Roasted macadamia nut cookies, Papua New Guinea vanilla, white chocolate, muscadavo suga, Bourbon soaked chocolate lady fingers, macadamia marzipan, white chocolate ganache.
Covet Barrel Aged Imperial Stout 14.1% ABV | Luau Brewing
an imperial stout aged for 32 months in 18 year Elijah Craig bourbon barrels. It is the sum of its simple parts: a massive stout: good, old barrels; and patience. Simplicity into complexity through detail, diligence, and patience.

horror (pronounced hawr-er) is a genre of fiction whose purpose is to create feelings of fear, dread, repulsion, and terror in the audience‚Äîin other words, it develops an atmosphere of horror.
Join us for our sixth annual horror themed beer event! Because who doesn't want an extra week of Halloween?

Horror movie themed drinks with frighteningly good presentations, and a rotation of iconic horror movies will be on the projectors and tv's all day/night!

Join us Saturday, August 3rd | 1pm - 11pm for a celebration of all things Potter!
We'll be dropping 5 Wizarding World inspired beers on draft & in cans to go! We highly recommend dressing up in your wizarding best!
Available for sale in person the day of the event. Limits will be determined 15mins prior to opening.
What‚Äôs Dropping in Package & on Draft:
Dessert Station: Butter Beer 6.5% ABV | 16oz 4pk cans
Our beloved gluten free dessert beer had to make its return for this special occasion! Conditioned on cream soda, butterscotch and vanilla soft serve.
Dessert Station: Cruciatus Curse 6.5% ABV | 16oz 4pk cans
We felt like this was the perfect excuse to add a little bit of spice.
Gluten Free Dessert Beer with peach, habanero, ginger, lime.
Dessert Station: Invisibility Cloak 6.5% ABV | 16oz 4pk cans
This drink is exceptionally rare and coveted like its name. This Gluten Free Dessert Beer is conditioned on blue raspberry, banana & vanilla beans.
Dessert Station: Room of Requirement 6.5% ABV | 16oz 4pk cans
Magically appearing when you‚Äôre in need of something delicious, this Gluten Free Dessert Beer is conditioned on raspberry soft serve & citrus soda.
Dessert Station: Polyjuice Potion 6.5% ABV | 16oz 4pk cans
This tasty concoction is conditioned on vanilla soft serve, passion fruit, lemon, kiwi & tangerine

horror (pronounced hawr-er) is a genre of fiction whose purpose is to create feelings of fear, dread, repulsion, and terror in the audience‚Äîin other words, it develops an atmosphere of horror.
Join us for our sixth annual horror themed beer event! Because who doesn't want an extra week of Halloween?
The entire tasting room will be turned into a scene out of your very worst nightmare as we celebrate all things HORROR.
Horror movie themed drinks with frighteningly good presentations, and a rotation of iconic horror movies will be on the projectors and tv's all day/night!
Come dressed up in your most horrific costumes and enjoy a night of pure terror with us.
This is an event for a mature audience. Due to some of the content and graphic imagery it may not be appropriate for young ones.
What's Dropping on Draft & To-Go
Rum BA You‚Äôve Got Red on You Gluten Free Dessert Beer 10% ABV | 500ml bottle
Rum barrel aged Strawberry Cheesecake inspired Gluten Free Dessert Beer conditioned on strawberry, graham cracker & cream cheese.
Rage Virus BA Gluten Free Sour 10% ABV | 500ml bottle
Tequila barrel aged Gluten Free Sour with, pineapple, dragonfruit, orange and agave nectar.
Bourbon BA Do you wanna play a game? Imperial Stout 15% ABV | 500ml bottle
Bourbon BA Imperial Stout aged in 2022 Parker's Heritage and Willett Family Estate 9 Year barrels for 2 years and then condition on rum soaked marshmallows, coffee, hazelnuts, vanilla beans and cinnamon
All Work and No Play (fka Redrum) Gluten Free Sour 8.5% ABV | 16oz 4pk cans
Gluten Free Beer conditioned on strawberry, banana, vanilla beans & caramel.
Xenomorph Blood Gluten Free Sour 8.5% ABV | 6oz 4pk cans
Gluten Free Beer conditioned on peach, pear, apricot, honey, mango and pineapple.

Horror movie themed drinks with frighteningly good presentations, and a rotation of iconic horror movies will be on the projectors and tv's all day/night!
Come dressed up in your most horrific costumes and enjoy a night of pure terror with us.
This is an event for a mature audience. Due to some of the content and graphic imagery it may not be appropriate for young ones.
What's Dropping on Draft & To-Go
Rum BA You‚Äôve Got Red on You Gluten Free Dessert Beer 10% ABV | 500ml bottle
Rum barrel aged Strawberry Cheesecake inspired Gluten Free Dessert Beer conditioned on strawberry, graham cracker & cream cheese.
Rage Virus BA Gluten Free Sour 10% ABV | 500ml bottle
Tequila barrel aged Gluten Free Sour with, pineapple, dragonfruit, orange and agave nectar.
Bourbon BA Do you wanna play a game? Imperial Stout 15% ABV | 500ml bottle
Bourbon BA Imperial Stout aged in 2022 Parker's Heritage and Willett Family Estate 9 Year barrels for 2 years and then condition on rum soaked marshmallows, coffee, hazelnuts, vanilla beans and cinnamon
All Work and No Play (fka Redrum) Gluten Free Sour 8.5% ABV | 16oz 4pk cans
Gluten Free Beer conditioned on strawberry, banana, vanilla beans & caramel.
Xenomorph Blood Gluten Free Sour 8.5% ABV | 6oz 4pk cans
Gluten Free Beer conditioned on peach, pear, apricot, honey, mango and pineapple.

In The Black: A Barrel Aged Beer Event
Friday, November 29, 2024
12:00‚ÄØPM
11:00‚ÄØPM
Corporate Ladder Brewing Company
4935 96th Street East
Palmetto, FL, 34221
United States
(map)
Google Calendar
ICS
Join us Black Friday November 29th at 12pm
for a special barrel aged beer event! We'll be tapping some draft only exclusives as well as releasing some brand new barrel aged beer in package and on draft! Be sure to check back for updates on what else we're releasing.
New Releases Dropping:
BA In The Black Imperial Stout 16% ABV | 500ml Bottle
Brewed in collaboration with Xul, this Imperial Stout is aged in Willett Family Estate 9 year bourbon barrels & conditioned on peanut butter cream & vanilla granola.
BA Executive Suite Imperial Stout 14.87% ABV | 500ml Bottle
Imperial Stout aged in Old Elk Wheated & Willett Family Estate 9 Year bourbon barrels¬†& conditioned on double marshmallow & comoros vanilla beans.
BA Amalgamation Imperial Stout 15.4% ABV | 500ml Bottle
Imperial Stout aged in Old Elk Wheated & Willett Family Estate 9 Year bourbon barrels &¬†conditioned on double marshmallow & comoros vanilla beans, peanut butter cream & vanilla granola.
The Lineup So Far:
Board Meeting Barrel Aged Stout 14% ABV
2023 GABF GOLD WINNER FOR PASTRY/DESSERT CATEGORY
Stout aged in Old Fitzgerald barrels for 18 months and then Stagg Jr barrels for 13 months for a total of 31 months and then conditioned on West Papua, Brazil and Tonga Vanilla Beans and Toasted Coconut. Collab with Bottlelogic
Member Pick Barrel Aged Stout 14% ABV
Shareholders Bottle ClubMember Pick for 2023. Imperial stout aged 24 months in Elijah Craig 13 year bourbon barrels with marshmallows, Comoros vanilla beans & toasted coconut.
Barrel Aged Stout Dividend No. 1 14% ABV
Aged in BLIS Maple Syrup barrels for 18 months & EH Taylor barrels for 6 months for a total of 24 months. Then conditioned on vanilla beans, cashews, & granola.
Member Pick Barrel Aged Fruit 10% ABV
Shareholders Bottle Club 2023. Rum & Bourbon Barrel Aged Gluten Free Sour conditioned on banana, pineapple soft serve, vanilla beans & strawberry.
Guest Draft List
Barrel Aged Beyond the Lines of Reason (2024) 13% ABV | Xul Beer
Imperial stout aged in 10yr Russell's Reserve barrels for 16 months then conditioned on an irresponsible amount of raw & toasted coconut.
Narfle the Garthok (2024) Barrel Aged Imperial Stout 13.7% ABV | Drekker Brewing
Imperial Stout aged in Heaven Hill barrels for two and a half years then conditioned on Banana, Peanut Butter, Cacao Nibs, Ceylon Cinnamon, Marshmallows, Graham Crackers, Milk Sugar, & Honey!
Double Barrel Deep Oblivion Imperial Stout 13% ABV | Cerebral Brewing
Imperial Stout aged 32 months in Willett Rye Barrels followed by 12 months in Stagg Jr Barrels conditioned on Coconut, Pecans & a blend of Congolese & Comorian Vanilla. Contains lactose.
Brownie Bash Invite Bottle #2 Barrel Aged Imperial Stout 13.9% ABV | Pontoon Brewing
Brownie Batch #2 in a Weller Antique Bourbon barrel for 29 months and Brownie Batch #3 in a 17 year Heaven Hill cask strength bourbon barrel to make the blend. Roasted macadamia nut cookies, Papua New Guinea vanilla, white chocolate, muscadavo suga, Bourbon soaked chocolate lady fingers, macadamia marzipan, white chocolate ganache.
Covet Barrel Aged Imperial Stout 14.1% ABV | Luau Brewing
an imperial stout aged for 32 months in 18 year Elijah Craig bourbon barrels. It is the sum of its simple parts: a massive stout: good, old barrels; and patience. Simplicity into complexity through detail, diligence, and patience.
